resources.string: This is a typical Help button in your app. It uses the Helpshift.showFAQs API to demonstrate integration of FAQs.
This demonstrates use of Helpshift.showConversation API to start a conversation with your customers. This is a typical contact/feedback button in your app.
This uses Helpshift.showFAQSection API to present a single FAQ section. To run this, replace SECTION_PUBLISH_ID with a valid publish-id from your agent dashboard, in HelpshiftDemoActivity.java
This uses Helpshift.showSingleFAQ API to present a single FAQ. To run this, replace QUESTION_PUBLISH_ID with a valid publish-id from your agent dashboard, in HelpshiftDemoActivity.java
